channel.title: Vagrant on Jarek Przygódzki's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on Jarek Przygódzki's Blog

item.title: Changing the directory for Vagrant boxes
item.description: The successfully downloaded Vagrant boxes are located at ~/.vagrant.d/boxes on Mac/Linux System and %USERPROFILE%/.vagrant.d/boxes on Windows. This can be changed by setting an environment variable named VAGRANT_HOME to specify the location of .vagrant.d, as in VAGRANT_HOME=F:\.vagrant.d # Windows # current terminal session set VAGRANT_HOME=F:\.vagrant.d # current user environment setx VAGRANT_HOME F:\.vagrant.d # system wide environment setx VAGRANT_HOME F:\.vagrant.d /M VAGRANT_HOME is documented here along with other interesting options.
